column2: "We're experiencing no issues taking control of the Cuentian Army."
"There have been some deserters, who now operate as common mercenaries or bandits, but they number only a few."
"However, there are still Devil Castles within our domain. They persist even if their summoner should perish."
"They will not disappear on their own, and so we must continue to destroy them."
"Guardian, I realise this places a great burden on you... But I must formally request your assistance."
"1. Leave it to me."
"2. It's no easy task on your own."
"I would gladly help you, if only I were able to use the Buster Tower..."
"Indeed, I must agree."
"We are searching for anyone else who can use the Buster Tower, but as yet we have found no one. Of course, that is to be expected."
"To destroy a Devil Castle created with Ephimera, one would need power equal to that of Ephimera."
"But you, Guardian, can use the Buster Towers without the aid of Ephimera. Your power already rivals Ephimera's."
"Hmm... I don't like the way you said that."
"I did not mean to imply anything by it. I was merely stating the facts. If you perceive anything more in what I said, surely that reflects more on you than on I?"
"You've got a comeback for everything, haven't you... Why don't you try giving <%me> a little thanks once in a while?"
"I show my appreciation by not doubting a single part of your experiences... Is that not to your liking, fairy?"
"Enough!"
"Regarding those who followed Lutz, we've been carrying out checks to try and determine their reasons, but so far we've found nothing particularly concerning."
"In fact, most of them welcome Harriet's coronation and ascendancy to the throne."
"My uncle viewed everything by his own exacting standards, and would often make unreasonable demands, so naturally there was some resentment..."
"So, you're saying that everyone has accepted Harriet's revolution?"
"No, I doubt that is the only reason. In the end, it became a battle for the throne, so it is likely they are simply following the winner."
"Cuent is not monolithic. Lutz was not the only one who benefited from the power of Ephimera."
"These people may pretend to follow us, but will secretly be waiting for any opportunity to sabotage all we have accomplished."
"That is why we must remain vigilant."
"Thank you for your report. Please continue to report on this matter."
